item.title: GRAFICO ABN 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 24, 2025

GRAFICO ABN 1.53 ETS2

The Gráfico ABN mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 enhances the game’s visual quality and atmosphere with improved graphics. It features realistic lighting, enhanced weather effects, reworked skies, improved color tones, and sharper textures, delivering a more immersive and lifelike driving experience. Compatible with a wide range of maps and mods, Gráfico ABN is fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, making it ideal for players who want to upgrade the visual realism of their gameplay.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: KamAZ 5490-65206 Neo v2.9.4 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 24, 2025

KamAZ 5490-65206 Neo v2.9.4 ETS2

The mod is divided into two KamAZ 5490 and 65206,
Each Kamaz has 3 cabs and 7 types of chassis.
Each cabin has its own set of skins.
Sold by a dealer of KamAZ modifications or a Mercedes dealer.
4 wiper modes.
There is animation of both windows.
Work in multiplayer is guaranteed.
There is support for advanced coupling.
Updated the mod to latest patch 1.53

Credits: Max_Dmitriev, SimKA, Jon_Ruda, EVR Studios, Piva, Alex Budaev

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: SOM VOLVO FH 2009 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 24, 2025

SOM VOLVO FH 2009 1.53 ETS2

The Volvo FH 2009 Sound mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 adds a realistic and immersive engine sound specifically for the 2009 Volvo FH model. It features high-quality recordings, including engine revs, turbo, retarder, exhaust, and interior sounds, providing a more authentic driving experience. Fully compatible with ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for players who want enhanced audio realism while driving the classic Volvo FH 2009.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: SOM IVECO ESCAPE DIRETO 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 24, 2025

SOM IVECO ESCAPE DIRETO 1.53 ETS2

The Iveco Escape Direto sound mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 adds a raw and powerful straight-pipe exhaust sound to Iveco trucks. Featuring high-quality audio recordings, including aggressive engine roars, gear shifts, and turbo sounds, this mod delivers a loud and immersive driving experience. Ideal for players who enjoy custom and performance-style truck sounds. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod brings a bold and realistic audio upgrade to your Iveco driving sessions.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: SOM MERCEDES O500RSD 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 24, 2025

SOM MERCEDES O500RSD 1.53 ETS2

The Mercedes O500RSD Sound mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 delivers a realistic and immersive sound pack for the Mercedes-Benz O500RSD coach bus. It features high-quality engine recordings, turbo whine, exhaust notes, and interior sounds, all carefully synchronized for a lifelike driving experience. Perfectly suited for bus driving enthusiasts, this sound mod enhances the overall realism and atmosphere. Fully compatible with ETS2 1.53, it’s ideal for players seeking authentic audio for their Mercedes O500RSD bus.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder.
